result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Plea hearing on July 16, 2015 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Andrew S Griffin
Current: 115 W Doty St, DCJ, Madison, WI 53703 United States  (Effective: 06-15-2015)
Prior: 321 Dvorak Ct, Stoughton, WI 53589
Defn request Sig Bond, State opposed; Court reduced Cash Bond to $350 per case, Referred to BMP, random drops; BMP to set all conditions

CASH BOND SET - REFERRAL TO BMP
- The Court finds that cash bond is necessary to assure the defendant's appearance in Court. Cash bond is set in the amount of $350 per case. If approved and accepted by BMP the defendant may post cash bail - at which time the defendant must report to and comply with DCBM as a condition of the defendant's release. The defendant shall report to DCBM by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail.  Defendant shall submit to random UA's as a condition of BMP at minimum.  
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Robert P.
- Defendant shall not possess any type of dangerous weapon.
- Defendant shall not threaten or direct any acts of physical violence against any household or apartment members.
Trial Judge - Br 2
Bail/bond hearing on June 11, 2015 at 08:15 am.
to modify cash bond amount - filed by Atty. Michael Yang
and Notice of DNA and Witness List (Plaintiff's)
Final pre-trial on June 17, 2015 at 08:00 am.
Def is terminated from BMP. Cash bail is reinstated in the amount of $500.
Final pre-trial on June 17, 2015 at 08:00 am.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Robert P.
- Defendant shall not possess any type of dangerous weapon.
- Defendant shall not threaten or direct any acts of physical violence against any household or apartment members.
- The court orders a signature bond in the amount of $500.00 per case on the condition that the defendant reports to, and complies with, Dane County Bail Monitoring (DCBM).  The defendant shall report to DCBM by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail.  If defendant fails to comply with DCBM, cash bail is automatically set in the amount of $500.00 (per case), as higher cash bail is necessary to assure appearance in court. BMP is removed as condition of bond.
Trial Judge - Br 2

Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney  State Public Defender.  Pat Bomhack appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading.  Defendant stood mute.  Court entered not guilty plea as to any misdemeanor counts.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 17, 2015 at 08:00 am.
